title: [Bug]: TerminalLogger is inconsistent with old logger after hitting Ctrl+C
body:
### Issue Description

Old logger shows `Attempting to cancel the build...` message when user is cancelling build. Terminal logger just ends with failed build. This one is probably minor :)

### Steps to Reproduce

Hit Ctrl+C during build.

### Expected Behavior

Cancellation message is written to the log.

### Actual Behavior

Cancellation message is not written to the log.

### Analysis

_No response_

### Versions & Configurations

_No response_
